mutants.original_line: standarized = unicodedata.normalize('NFKD', name.lower()).encode('ascii', 'ignore') if type(name) != str else name.lower()
mutants.mutated_line: standarized = unicodedata.normalize('NFKD', name.lower()).encode('ascii', 'ignore') if type(name) == str else name.lower()

mutants.original_line: standarized = unicodedata.normalize('NFKD', name.lower()).encode('ascii', 'ignore') if type(name) != str else name.lower()
mutants.mutated_line: standarized = unicodedata.normalize('NFKD', name.lower()).encode('', 'ignore') if type(name) != str else name.lower()

mutants.original_line: standarized = unicodedata.normalize('NFKD', name.lower()).encode('ascii', 'ignore') if type(name) != str else name.lower()
mutants.mutated_line: standarized = unicodedata.normalize('NFKD', name.lower()).encode('ascii', '') if type(name) != str else name.lower()

mutants.original_line: return all((name in std_original for name in std_another))
mutants.mutated_line: return all((name not in std_original for name in std_another))

mutants.original_line: standarized = unicodedata.normalize('NFKD', name.lower()).encode('ascii', 'ignore') if type(name) != str else name.lower()
mutants.mutated_line: standarized = unicodedata.normalize('', name.lower()).encode('ascii', 'ignore') if type(name) != str else name.lower()
